title: wanting to join club
body: unranked only level 11 but wanting a club tag invite me plox {{champion:37}}  WONK ;)

replies.body: Hello, I'm not sure if this is what your looking for, but I have a small clan that welcoming all players of any rank, level or player skill. I am a level30 Unranked player, I'm not too good either, but I'll try to help in any way I can. We are friendly and we have cookies. If you wish to join, just send me a friend request at Zeora.
